## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                       | Type                       | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------- |
| `modeVariant` | `mode-variant` | Set the variant of the Accordion. | `"primary" \| "secondary"` | `null`  |

| Slot          | Description                               |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
